  • {value}
    • ) } }) },[]) return items; } function Pay(){ const elements = ['one', 'two', 'three']; const items = [] var url = "https:toyyibpay.com/api/getBankFPX"; useEffect(() => { fetch(url) .then(response => response.json()) .then(result => { console.log(result); for (var i = 0; i < result.length; i++) { items.push(
  • {result[i].CODE}
    • ) } }) },[]) console.log(items); return (
